<p>The Hague (; Dutch: Den Haag [dɛn ˈɦaːx] (listen) or 's-⁠Gravenhage [ˌsxraːvə(n)ˈɦaːɣə] (listen)) is a city on the western coast of the Netherlands on the North Sea and the capital of the province of South Holland. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=the_hague">Text from Wikipedia</a></p>
